name: The Mechanical Pencil Terrorist
description:
Set inside a game designers bad game, you play as a playtester given the task to fix this really bad game. Inspired by the works of Davey Wreden and William Pugh, join the designer through his game as he realises its not that hard to add little things to make his game actually half decent. 

The Mechanical Pencil Terrorist is currently under development and a polished prototype beta version  of the game will be available by early May.
